Content: I do like the features, set up, and easy navigation throughout the app. It's also very explanatory of the set up. The warnings, watches, gov notifications, etc. are always informative. But I've noticed that the readings are getting more and more off target than the other weather apps. Hope it gets back on track soon.
App Name: AccuWeather: Weather Alerts & Live Storm Radar
Strongest Sub-Dimension Definition: The app is ease to use, accessible, and respond quickly when the users interacts with it.
